message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking to get the product for $120, but I have to make a profit. I can meet you in the middle at $140. Would you be willing to go up to that price?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $120?

I can see you're really interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $135. I'm willing to make a small concession, but I need to make a profit. Would you be willing to meet me at $135?
I'm really interested in the product, but I've got to stay within my budget. Can you seriously consider selling it to me for $120?

I understand you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make a final concession, but I need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $130. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not willing to go above $120. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet on this price.
